tns:patch.author: vlimansky
tns:patch.description: delete duplicate topics in the glossary. This script should work ok on any database

script.lang: delete from HELP_HELP_TOPICS t where t.helptopicid in (select max (t1.helptopicid) from HELP_HELP_TOPICS t1 where topic_type = 2 group by t1.topickey, t1.bodyeditkey, t1.siteid, t1.moduleinstance, t1.topic_type having count(t1.helptopicid) > 1 order by max (t1.helptopicid));
